thread.title: Derrick Hawkins

author: Derrick Hawkins
title: Derrick Hawkins
text: So obviously I'm not dealing with this company by choice, but of requirement. I found the agent Taylor to be extremely down to earth and chill and made an undesirable situation not such a hardship to bear. He was more than helpful in helping to get me setup with my device, Which was a lil more involved than others as I was dealing with interstate issues. I definitely would recommend this company to anyone else who finds themselves in need of their services
